T H E A T R E ROYAL, P R U R Y - L A N E .

Hi» Majesty's Servants will perforin the National Ballad Opera, (the subject from Ossum) called

M A L V I N A.
The OVERTCRE and MUSIC, composed, selected, and arranged from Scottish and Irish Melodies, with new
Accompaniment- hy Mr. T. COOKE,
CALEOONIANS.

preparation) called

Harlequin & Cock Robin;
OH, THE

BABES

in the TTOOD.

The Music, extensive Scenery and Machinery, Dresses and Decorations entirely New.
The Overture and Pantomime Music composed by Mr. R. HUGHES. The Vocal Music & Introduction to the Harlequinade by Mr. BEEWITT.
The Scenery by Messrs. MARtNARI, ANDREWS, ADAMS, T. MORRIS, SEWA,RD, and 8TANFIKLI).
The Machinery by Mr. NALU
The Tricks and M e o a n i w l Changes by Messrs. H. SEYMOUR, SOUTHBY. and KELLY.
The Properties and Decorations by Mr. KELLY.
The Dresses by Mr. BANKS and the Misses SMITH.

The whole Invented and Produced by Mr. W. BARRYM ORE.
